name: mcp-solar5estrella
description: MCP server for Solar5Estrella solar energy quote generation in Panama. Calculates system sizing, equipment requirements, costs, and ROI for residential, commercial, and industrial solar installations.

tools.name: calculate_system_size
tools.description: Calculate optimal solar system capacity based on daily consumption and peak sun hours

tools.name: validate_roof_capacity
tools.description: Check if available roof space can accommodate the required solar panel array

tools.name: calculate_equipment_requirements
tools.description: Calculate complete equipment list including panels, inverters, mounting, and accessories

tools.name: generate_solar_quote
tools.description: Generate a complete formal solar energy system quote with costs, ROI, and terms

tools.name: get_equipment_inventory
tools.description: Query distributor equipment inventory with filtering by type, brand, and stock levels

tools.name: calculate_roi_metrics
tools.description: Calculate financial return on investment metrics including payback period and 25-year savings

tools.name: get_location_solar_data
tools.description: Retrieve solar radiation and weather data for specific Panama locations
